SQL.LOAD: SELECT claim_auth_item_id, invoice_item_id, reconciliation_status_id, reconciled_amount, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, invoice_reconciliation_id FROM elp_invoice_reconciliation WHERE invoice_reconciliation_id = :invoice_reconciliation_id
SQL.LOAD_BY_INVOICE_ITEM_ID: SELECT claim_auth_item_id, invoice_item_id, reconciliation_status_id, reconciled_amount, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, invoice_reconciliation_id FROM elp_invoice_reconciliation WHERE invoice_item_id = :invoice_item_id
SQL.LOAD_BY_CLAIM_AUTH_ITEM_ID: SELECT claim_auth_item_id, invoice_item_id, reconciliation_status_id, reconciled_amount, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, invoice_reconciliation_id FROM elp_invoice_reconciliation WHERE claim_auth_item_id = :claim_auth_item_id
SQL.GET_INVOICE_AUTHORIZATION_STATUS: SELECT DISTINCT reconciliation_status_id FROM elp_invoice_reconciliation WHERE claim_auth_item_id in (select claim_auth_item_id from elp_claim_auth_item where claim_authorization_id = :claim_authorization_id)
SQL.CAN_UNDO_BALANCE_INVOICE: select count(*) from elp_invoice_reconciliation where invoice_item_id in (select invoice_item_id from elp_invoice_item where invoice_id = :invoice_id) and reconciliation_status_id <> GetItemIdFromListAndItem('INVRECONSTAT', 'RC')
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_invoice_reconciliation SET claim_auth_item_id = :claim_auth_item_id, invoice_item_id = :invoice_item_id, reconciliation_status_id = :reconciliation_status_id, reconciled_amount = :reconciled_amount, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE invoice_reconciliation_id = :invoice_reconciliation_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_invoice_reconciliation ( claim_auth_item_id, invoice_item_id, reconciliation_status_id, reconciled_amount, created_by, invoice_reconciliation_id ) VALUES ( :claim_auth_item_id, :invoice_item_id, :reconciliation_status_id, :reconciled_amount, :created_by, :invoice_reconciliation_id )
